name: Magical Eats
description:
If you are experiencing audio desync or levels not ending, try the windows-version

Gameplay

Much like other Match-3 games, your goal is to assemble groups of three or more to defeat your opponent. 

You may only drop blocks on the fourth note of the Metronome, indicated by the yellow region, if you take too long or miss your timing your blocks will fly off wildly!

!! Issues !!
Some people have reported that the metronome drifts off and tracks end abruptly on the web player. Lookin' into those, uploaded a standalone that seems to behave better if your browser is acting funky.

Sometimes(??) blocks can still be placed and it doesn't catch a level end state

There is no pause/return to menu

Game is brutally hard

This is a Jam Game that unfortunately isn't super-finished or polished, expect updates for improved difficulty, feedback, and despite writing all the netplay in I didn't actually get a chance to hook it up so look forward to that too I suppose.

Description
Magical Eats, a Game Jam entry on Nitori.Itch.io is a combination Rhythm/Puzzler Match-3 game based on the ArcSys game, Magical Beats. Join Touhou's Marisa as she dates her way through five stages matching blocks to the beat. This game was produced for the Touhou Pride Jam 3 event.
